chainsaw
Class SearchByManufacturer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component

                      chainsaw.SearchByManufacturer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class SearchByManufacturer
extends javax.swing.JDialog

Class that displays SearchByManufacturer window of GUI. Allows user to search for chainsaws by manufacturer.

Version:
April 2008
Author:
Joshua Woodyatt
See Also:
Serialized Form
